metadata.title: CVE-2021-33194 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: golang.org/x/net before v0.0.0-20210520170846-37e1c6afe023 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via crafted ParseFragment input.

notes.note: amurray> google-guest-agent contains a vendored copy of golang-golang-x-net

criterions.comment: golang-golang-x-net package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
